metadata.title: CVE-2024-27416 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: hci_event: Fix handling of HCI_EV_IO_CAPA_REQUESTIf we received HCI_EV_IO_CAPA_REQUEST whileHCI_OP_READ_REMOTE_EXT_FEATURES is yet to be responded assume the remotedoes support SSP since otherwise this event shouldn't be generated.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
